flawed_nl_solution:
There are 5-1=<<5-1=3>>3 more lions each month.
There will be 3*12=<<3*12=36>>36 more lions after 1 year.
There were 148-36=<<148-36=112>>112 lions in Londolozi at first.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 4, not 3. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
